name: dashboard-stats.toml

component.name: Dashboard Stats
component.description: Statistics cards and metrics display for admin dashboard

quick-stats.name: Quick Stats
quick-stats.description: Hero metric cards with gradient backgrounds

order-status.name: Order Status Overview
order-status.description: Order counts by status in 4-column grid

items.label: Assigned
items.description: Orders assigned to specialist, not yet started

pending-actions.name: Pending Actions
pending-actions.description: Alert card shown when orders need attention

list: Click to navigate to relevant section

rawContent:
[component]
id = "dashboard-stats"
name = "Dashboard Stats"
description = "Statistics cards and metrics display for admin dashboard"

[component.sections]

[component.sections.quick-stats]
name = "Quick Stats"
description = "Hero metric cards with gradient backgrounds"
layout = "2-column grid"
[[component.sections.quick-stats.cards]]
label = "Total Orders"
value = "orders.data.length"
badge = "Today's count"
color = "cyan gradient"
icon = "ClipboardList"

[[component.sections.quick-stats.cards]]
label = "Specialists"
value = "specialists.data.length"
badge = "Active count"
color = "teal gradient"
icon = "Users"

[component.sections.order-status]
name = "Order Status Overview"
description = "Order counts by status in 4-column grid"
layout = "4-column grid"
[[component.sections.order-status.items]]
status = "pending"
label = "Pending"
filter = "status in ['created', 'reviewing']"
color = "amber"
description = "Orders waiting for assignment"

[[component.sections.order-status.items]]
status = "assigned"
label = "Assigned"
filter = "status in ['assigned', 'on_way']"
color = "purple"
description = "Orders assigned to specialist, not yet started"

[[component.sections.order-status.items]]
status = "in_progress"
label = "In Progress"
filter = "status === 'in_progress'"
color = "cyan"
description = "Active shifts currently running"

[[component.sections.order-status.items]]
status = "completed"
label = "Completed"
filter = "status === 'completed'"
color = "green"
description = "Finished orders awaiting payment"

[component.sections.pending-actions]
name = "Pending Actions"
description = "Alert card shown when orders need attention"
condition = "pendingOrders.length > 0"
styling = "amber border, amber background"
action = "Navigate to orders page"

[component.features]
list = [
  "Real-time order counts by status",
  "Today's orders badge",
  "Active specialists count",
  "Color-coded status indicators",
  "Action alert for pending orders",
  "Click to navigate to relevant section"
]

[component.styling]
quick_stats = "gradient backgrounds (cyan, teal)"
status_grid = "colored backgrounds matching status"
responsive = true

[relations]
entities = ["order", "specialist"]
routes = ["admin-dashboard"]

[implementation]
note = "Implemented inline in AdminDashboard component"
status = "implemented"
file = "src/prototype/pages/admin/AdminDashboard.tsx"
